languages.text: "Вы называете Бога-Императора "смертью". Не всем нравится подобное сравнение".
"You say the God-Emperor is death. There are some who might find the comparison blasphemous."
languages.original_text: "Вы называете Бога-Императора "смертью". Не всем нравится подобное сравнение".

traits.locale_text: "Your people refer to the God-Emperor as death. Not everyone approves of such a comparison."
"Your people refer to the God-Emperor as death. Not everyone approves of such a comparison."
"You say the God-Emperor is death. There are some who might find that controversial."
"You say the God-Emperor is death. There are some who might find that controversial."
"You say the God-Emperor is death. There are some who might find the comparison blasphemous."
"You say the God-Emperor is death. There are some who might find the comparison blasphemous."

languages.text: «Dice que el Dios Emperador es la muerte. Hay quien consideraría blasfemia tal comparación».
languages.original_text: "You say the God-Emperor is death. There are some who might find the comparison blasphemous."

traits.locale_text: «Dice que el Dios Emperador es la muerte. Hay quien consideraría blasfemia tal comparación».

languages.text: 「神帝陛下は死神だと言ったな。そのような比較は冒涜的だと思う者もいることだろう」
languages.original_text: "You say the God-Emperor is death. There are some who might find the comparison blasphemous."

traits.locale_text: 「神帝陛下は死神だと言ったな。そのような比較は冒涜的だと思う者もいることだろう」

languages.text: “你说神皇就是死亡本身，有些人可能会认为这样的类比是在亵渎神明。”
languages.original_text: "You say the God-Emperor is death. There are some who might find the comparison blasphemous."

traits.locale_text: “你说神皇就是死亡本身，有些人可能会认为这样的类比是在亵渎神明。”

languages.text: "Ihr sagt der Gottimperator sei der Tod. Manch einer könnte diesen Vergleich blasphemisch finden."
languages.original_text: "You say the God-Emperor is death. There are some who might find the comparison blasphemous."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr sagt der Gottimperator sei der Tod. Manch einer könnte diesen Vergleich blasphemisch finden."

languages.text: « Vous dites que l'Empereur-Dieu et la mort ne font qu'un, mais certaines personnes jugeraient cette comparaison blasphématoire. »
languages.original_text: "You say the God-Emperor is death. There are some who might find the comparison blasphemous."

traits.locale_text: « Vous dites que l'Empereur-Dieu et la mort ne font qu'un, mais certaines personnes jugeraient cette comparaison blasphématoire. »

languages.text: "Tanrı İmparator, ölümdür diyorsun. Oysa kimisi bu benzetmeyi küfür sayabilir."
languages.original_text: "You say the God-Emperor is death. There are some who might find the comparison blasphemous."
